price: Sema: Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu ni wa pekee.
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Hao wanao sema kwa kejeli, "Tusifie Mola wako Mlezi.": waambie: Yeye ni Mwenyezi Mungu wa pekee hapana mwenginewe, wala hana mshirika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
